name: Merge Inn - Tasty Match Puzzle
description:
Help Maisie with her dream mansion to serve up delicious meals to townies and visitors!

Unpack the boxes and merge ingredients into yummy meals. Master kitchen tools to cook dishes and satisfy your customers.

Unlock new cuisines as you play and master your dish cooking experience!

Features:

• MERGE - Combine different items into new ones! Hundreds of combinations of tasty food await!
• SERVE - Your cooking will be put to a good use to be enjoyed by your forest friends!
• RELAX - Slow paced and mind jolting
• PLAY YOUR WAY - Please as little or as much as you want. No time pressure here!
